snippet: The Coast Guard suspended its search-and-rescue operation in the waters off the Florida Panhandle, and military searchers found the wreckage of a Black Hawk helicopter that crashed Tuesday.
abstract: Coast Guard ends search-and-rescue operation off Florida Panhandle for survivors of Black Hawk helicopter which crashed in Navarre, signalling that survivors are unlikely to be found; helicopter and two of four soldiers' bodies have been recovered.

byline.contributor: Alan Blinder contributed reporting from Jacksonville, N.C.

lead_paragraph: The Coast Guard suspended its search-and-rescue operation in the waters off the Florida Panhandle, and military searchers found the wreckage of a Black Hawk helicopter that crashed Tuesday.

headline.main: Hope of Finding Survivors in Army Helicopter Crash Fades
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | South; Florida: Helicopter Crash Rescue Operation Ends

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
